sen.j: 四条駅（しじょうえき）は京都府京都市にある駅。
sen.e: Shijo Station is located in Kyoto Cty, Kyoto Prefecture.
Shijo Station is located in Kyoto Cty, Kyoto Prefecture.
Shijo stations are located in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 複数形にしました。City と修正しました。

sen.j: 2つの駅が異なる場所に存在する（東西に1.1km程度離れている）。
sen.e: Two stations with the same name of Shijo Station exist and are located 1.1 km apart east and west.
Two stations called Shijo Station exist, and they're located 1.1 km apart on an east-west axis.
Two stations called Shijo Station exist, and they're located 1.1 km apart on an east-west axis.

sen.j: 四条駅 (京阪) - 東山区にある京阪本線の駅。
sen.e: Shijo Station (of Keihan Electric Railway) - a station in Higashiyama Ward on Keihan Main Line
Shijo Station (of the Keihan Electric Railway) - a station in Higashiyama Ward on the Keihan Main Line
Shijo Station (of the Keihan Electric Railway) - a station in Higashiyama Ward on the Keihan Main Line

sen.j: 2008年度に祇園四条駅へ改称される予定。
sen.e: The name is scheduled to be changed to Gion-shijo Station in the fiscal 2008.
The name is scheduled to be changed to Gion-shijo Station in fiscal 2008.
The name is scheduled to be changed to Gion-shijo Station in fiscal year 2008.
sen.cmt: fiscal → fiscal yearに変更しました。

sen.j: 四条駅 (京都市営地下鉄) - 下京区にある京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の駅。
sen.e: Shijo Station (of Kyoto City Subway) - a station in Shimogyo Ward on Karasuma Line of Kyoto City Subway.
Shijo Station (of the Kyoto City Subway) - a station in Shimogyo Ward on the Karasuma Line of the Kyoto City Subway
Shijo Station (of the Kyoto Municipal Subway) - a station in Shimogyo Ward on the Karasuma Line of the Kyoto Municipal Subway
